title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 110.1 - Records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 110.1 - Records

State Regulations

Except as otherwise provided by law, all records of the

Department shall be made available to the public in accordance with Public

Officers Law Article 6, known as the Freedom of Information Law
(FOIL). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
110.1

Adopted

New

York State Register January 29, 2025/Volume XLVII, Issue 04, eff. 1/29/2025

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
